I'm Drew, a 38 year old trans woman living in Saskatchewan. After a 13 year military career including one deployment to Kandahar, AFG, I was medically released from the Canadian Army in March 2016. I am interested in Canadian military history, the history and development of the sport of Canadian football, most varieties of Star Trek, cats, and trans/human rights. Hoping to avoid feeling like I'm just shouting into the abyss this time around...

note: electron rancher, bicycle medic. Colorado. Ex-G+ user. Femtoinfluencer. I build stuff and ride bikes. 少し日本語を話します。

Inventor of the USB Typewriter, the ChromaCube D6, the Rack™, the Synaesthesiasizer, the Electric Wurlitzharmonica, and other fanciful creations for a more innocent time. Husband/Dad with three unbelievable kids. I love to bike around my new hometown of Portland, OR.

note: Frog from space. I ramble on various topics. I like #science. I vent about #chronicillness eg #dysautonomia #POTS #EDS. I talk to your pets! Mostly I am here to see all the pets and also the mosses and mushrooms and lichens. (Profile pic is frog in spacesuit; header is outline drawing of frog from nounproject) Call me Froggie! (she/her)
